item.title: By: Andres Panado
item.dc:creator: Andres Panado
item.description: FYI....we do offer markers (green, blue, black, red) and erasers at the front desk. They do NOT have to be checked out like the dongles & chargers. Often times, students will come to the desk reporting there are no markers/eraser in the study room, and we just gladly hand them out. I'm not sure if checking out a bag of these items will make it easier for students and I think they will feel like "it's just one more thing to worry about returning to the front desk". One suggestion I have is for someone to replenish the rooms with markers/erasers regularly on a weekly basis (like every Sunday) so at least there's a good chance that rooms are better equipped during the first days of the week. Walking around and putting markers in rooms shouldn't take very long I would think especially it's relatively quieter on weekends than weekdays.
